description.value:
Primary Energy: Air 3 (granting understanding of all speech) Supporting Energy: Time 3 (duration 1 hour) Range: self, touch Duration: 1 hour Total Cost: 6 Energy Action: Complex weave (2 actions) Weaving Roll: Air Potential + Air Mastery / Time Potential + Time Mastery Effect: Touch a creature. For the duration, target can understand and speak any language. Doesn't help with written languages. Saving Throw: None Success Scaling: 0 = fails, 1 = 10 minutes, 2 = full effect, 3 = 4 hours, 4 = 12 hours, 5 = 1 day
